channel.title: Make non Wilderness? With nonWild method
channel.description:
Hey, my source has the nonWild method... How do I use it? I've heard several ways so I'm not exactly sure how... I heard it's getting the top left coords, then bottom right? Well, I have the coords...
Top Left: [#]2676 [#]3324
Top Right: [#]2674 [#]3291
Oh, and my nonWild boolean
[code]public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3161 && absX <= 3240 && absY >= 3804 && absY <=3866 ) || (absX >= 2954 && absX <= 3004 && absY >= 3679 && absY <=3709 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3231 && absX <=3248 && absY >=3601 && absY <=3618 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| (absX >=2952 && absX <=2961 && absY >=3021 && absY <=3027 )|| (absX >=3148 && absX <=3181 && absY >=3177 && absY <=3687 )|| (absX >=3097 && absX <=3114 && absY >=3926 && absY <=3942 )|| (absX >=3560 && absX <=3570 && absY >=3307 && absY <=3319 )|| (absX >=2981 && absX <=3008 && absY >=3928 && absY <=3966 )|| (absX >=2422 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }[/code]

item.title: Make non Wilderness? With nonWild method
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:8, topic:159524”]You don’t add it with the ( at the beginning.

absX >= W/E && absX <= W/E && absY >= W/E && absY <=W/E || absX >=2674 && absX <=2645 && absY >=3289 && absY <=3324 || MORE COORDS HERE.[/quote]
Shouldn’t really matter with parenthesis.
Like;
System.out.println((4 + 4) + (2 + 2));
Is the same as;
System.out.println(4 + 4 + 2 + 2);

However, I think the first one looks neater.

Read full topic

item.title: Make non Wilderness? With nonWild method
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“X F U R Y X, post:3, topic:159524”]Yes… I’ve have figured many things out on my own… its just that these are the ones I don’t know about… your saying everything, that means i asked, what, 7 things… so you think 7/7 is what I need help on? How did you know it was out of 7?

FINE IF YOU PEOPLE AREN’T INTERESTED IN HELPING THEN I’LL GOTO ANOTHER FORUMS… THOUGHT THIS WAS HELP SECTION…[/quote]

The majority of people on these forums are only concerned with themselves, or they’ll get real pissy when you ask them something, I’ve almost never seen a mod or admin on here help someone, all they do is lock topics, or mute people. The people only help if they get something back, I would help you if I knew how to do this, I believe there was a tutorial on it awhile ago, but not sure if it’s there anymore or not. I’m sorry for not being able to help =.

Read full topic

item.title: Make non Wilderness? With nonWild method
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey, my source has the nonWild method… How do I use it? I’ve heard several ways so I’m not exactly sure how… I heard it’s getting the top left coords, then bottom right? Well, I have the coords…

Top Left:
[#]2676
[#]3324

Top Right:
[#]2674
[#]3291

Oh, and my nonWild boolean

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3161 && absX <= 3240 && absY >= 3804 && absY <=3866 ) || (absX >= 2954 && absX <= 3004 && absY >= 3679 && absY <=3709 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3231 && absX <=3248 && absY >=3601 && absY <=3618 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| (absX >=2952 && absX <=2961 && absY >=3021 && absY <=3027 )|| (absX >=3148 && absX <=3181 && absY >=3177 && absY <=3687 )|| (absX >=3097 && absX <=3114 && absY >=3926 && absY <=3942 )|| (absX >=3560 && absX <=3570 && absY >=3307 && absY <=3319 )|| (absX >=2981 && absX <=3008 && absY >=3928 && absY <=3966 )|| (absX >=2422 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }
